snippet.title: Goat Simulator Remastered – Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Lick, kick, and flip your way back to 2014 with Goat Simulator: Remastered, the complete and improved Goat Simulator experience at least one person asked for! 🐐

Celebrate 10 years of Goat Simulator in style with a remaster that brings upgraded graphics, a dedicated mutator menu, and EVERY ORIGINAL DLC in one complete package. What more could you ask for? 🥳

Coming soon to PC, PlayStation, and Xbox Series X/S consoles on November 7th 📅

📜 Wishlist NOW on all available platforms! 📜 

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1762930/Goat_Simulator_Remastered/ 
Epic Games Store: https://store.epicgames.com/en-US/p/goat-simulator-remastered-926445 
Microsoft Store: https://www.xbox.com/en-GB/games/store/goat-simulator-remastered/9p71qfsc7q34 
Xbox Series X/S: https://www.xbox.com/en-GB/games/store/goat-simulator-remastered/9p71qfsc7q34 
PlayStation 5: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10003965

➖ Follow Coffee Stain! ➖
💻 Website - https://coffeestain.com/games/ 
🐥 Twitter/X -  https://x.com/Coffee_Stain 
📘 Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/CoffeeStainStudios/
